linearizedBaseContracts.name: Heritable

parameters.documentation: @dev Throw an exception if called by any account other than the heir's.
parameters.name: onlyHeir

modifiers.documentation:
@dev Use these getter functions to access the internal variables in
an inherited contract.
modifiers.name: heir

modifiers.documentation:
@dev Heir can pronounce the owners death. To claim the ownership, they will
have to wait for `heartbeatTimeout` seconds.
modifiers.name: proclaimDeath

modifiers.documentation: @dev Owner can send a heartbeat if they were mistakenly pronounced dead.
modifiers.name: heartbeat

modifiers.documentation: @dev Allows heir to transfer ownership only if heartbeat has timed out.
modifiers.name: claimHeirOwnership
